episodes.title: When MLM Meets the Church: Tami’s Powerful Story.
episodes.description:
Today, we're diving into a unique and compelling story that merges faith and business. Our guest shares her experience with a multi-level marketing (MLM) organization intertwined with her church community. 🕊️💼
 
This conversation illuminates those intersections and offers insights into potential challenges and concerning flags to watch out for. Let's learn together and be better informed about how to navigate what can be a problematic dual focus.
 
🔔 Don't forget to subscribe and hit the bell icon to stay updated on more survivor stories and valuable content!

________

beEmboldened exists for those impacted by religious trauma by providing support for prevention of victimization and revictimization, creating a safe space to ask questions and to heal.

beEmboldened.com (formerly Naomi Wright Ministries / NWM).

episodes.title: Dancing for the Devil with Lindsey Medenwaldt
episodes.description: Dancing on TikTok? Spiritual abuse? Where will this rabbit hole lead? Join Founder and Executive Director, Naomi Wright, and author/apologist, Lindsey Medenwaldt, as we investigate together the organization highlighted in the recent docuseries, "Dancing for the Devil: the 7M TikTok Cult". Come with your questions as we talk about this group and why it's important to know about them.

episodes.title: Surviving poor theology: Nakita's story of Hyper-Charismatic church abuse.
episodes.description:
In this episode of the Reclamation Podcast, we delve into Nakita's journey within the hyper-charismatic church movement. Join us to explore and learn about the profound ramifications of misguided doctrines, shedding light on their high cost on an individual's mental and spiritual well-being. 
 
 Some resources for you:
 
 https://denverjournal.denverseminary.edu/
 https://www.beemboldened.com/resources
________

episodes.title: Scientology Q&A
episodes.description: If you're familiar with the world of spiritual abuse, you've probably heard of the Church of Scientology. Join Founder & Executive Director Naomi Wright, and author/apologist Lindsey Medenwaldt to ask your questions about this group. What is the public perception of this group? What are the consequences for leaving? Why is this well known high control group still gaining members? Come with your questions, ready for a deep dive on this topic.

episodes.title: Josh's story: How a youth pastor lost his job for taking a stand against spiritual abuse.
episodes.description:
In this episode of the Reclamation Podcast, Josh Klein tells his story of the spiritual abuse he saw and experienced in his position as a youth pastor, which ended in his termination. Don't miss this conversation where he shares his experiences, warning signs, and his thoughts in retrospect. 
 
If you want to know more about what Josh Klein does now, click on the following link: https://freethinkingministries.com/josh-klein/

To read Josh's material: https://freethinkingministries.com/klein/
________
